activities: Airbnb processes Swiss personal data relating to (1) hosts and guests who are using our platform, (2) individual representatives of corporate business partners of Airbnb and its subsidiaries in Switzerland.
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Computer Services - (CSV)General Consumer Goods - (GCG)Travel & Tourism Services - (TRA)
personaldata: User data regarding online and offline use
recoursemech: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
